g.style: box-sizing: content-box; position: absolute; left: 0px; shape-rendering: geometricprecision; pointer-events: none;

path.style: stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 0.5; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 0.5; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(253, 185, 52); stroke-opacity: 0; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 0; stroke-width: 1; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 0.5; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 0.5; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(253, 185, 52); stroke-opacity: 0; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 0; stroke-width: 1; opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(65, 64, 66); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px 1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px 1px 1px;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(65, 64, 66); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px 1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px 1px 1px;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(65, 64, 66); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px 1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px 1px 1px;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(253, 185, 52); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(65, 64, 66); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px 1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px 1px 1px;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(65, 64, 66); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px 1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 1px -1px 1px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) -1px 1px 1px;
